test.name: TEST-DEF-80050
test.description: Devise a test with two partitions: 1) A regular partition 2) A supervisor partition Check that the first partition is unable to change a variable in the supervisor area (and attempting to do so raises a Health Monitor event), and the second partition is able to change the same variable.

teststep.description: Attempt to a write predefined value to the PMK variable PMK_TOD_Is_set. Verify a 0x09 Trap was generated.
Read the PMK_TOD_Is_set variable value. Verify that the value has not changed.
Attempt to a write predefined value to the PMK variable PMK_TOD_Is_set. Verify a trap was not generated.
Read the variable and verify the correctness of its value.
